title: Title of the website
result:
The result of the ratio calculation for a given locale.
Parameters:
* $1 - Ratio of people with COVID-19
* $2 - Location
* $3 - Date updated
explanation:
Explanation of how ratio is calculated. Displayed in the footer of a place.
Parameters:
* $1 - Place name
* $2 - Population of place
* $3 - Number of cases in place.
* $4 - Name of person who published video
* $5 - {{msg-mw|covidratio-video}}
* $6 - The numeral 14 struck through since it is no longer valid.
video:
Word to describe an online video.
{{Identical|Video}}
source-code: Phrase to describe the code of software
license:
Phrase to describe a type of software license.
Parameters:
* $1 - SPDX License Code
